T02D3608:230b-1: pradzny'a lo ka s'a dha nam bi dhi:/
T02D3608:230b-3: shes rab kyi snang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga / rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3608:230b-4: blo ngan bsreg mkhas smra ba ngan pa'i phyogs 'jig cing //
T02D3608:230b-5: dug 'joms skye bo'i tshogs rnams thar la bde bar skyong //
T02D3608:230b-6: rab zhi bde ba 'phel mdzad rdo rje phag mo la //
T02D3608:230b-7: kam kas byin ni phyag 'tshal lha mo'i tshogs pa bre //
T02D3608:230b-8: de la mtshan mo nam phyed kyi thun gyi lhag
T02D3608:230b-9: ma la cho ga bzhin du langs nas dur khrod
T02D3608:230b-10: la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas 'ga' zhig
T02D3608:230b-11: tu tsandan bzang po la sogs pas byugs te me
T02D3608:231a-1: tshogs pas gcal du bkram pas nye bar mdzes pa la /
T02D3608:231a-2: mngon sum du ro'i gdan nam /
T02D3608:231a-3: yang na ji lta ba'i stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3608:231a-4: byams pa la sogs pa bsgom pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3608:231a-5: bas rang gi snying gar aa yig las skyes pa'i
T02D3608:231a-6: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hr'i:yig dkar po las skyes
T02D3608:231a-7: pa'i 'od zer gyi dra bas rab tu gsal bar
T02D3608:231a-8: mdzad nas / rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i bla ma dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02D3608:231a-9: byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D3608:231a-10: ji lta ba bzhin du mdun du mngon sum du
T02D3608:231a-11: yang dag par bltas nas snying ga'i sa bon las
T02D3608:231a-12: byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo dang /
T02D3608:231a-16: dpa' bo'i blo gros ma dang /
T02D3608:231a-18: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D3608:231a-20: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad po rnams dang /
T02D3608:231a-25: lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang /
T02D3608:231a-28: bya gdong ma ste gsung gi 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad po rnams dang /
T02D3608:231a-37: sku'i 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad po rnams te /
T02D3608:231a-38: nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i kha dog rnams so //
T02D3608:231a-40: 'od dpag med dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams kyis dbu brgyan pa zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3608:231a-45: 'khor lo dang thod pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02D3608:231a-46: zur phud gsum gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3608:231a-47: gri gug dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D3608:231a-48: lag pa'i 'dab mas mchod pa thogs pa rnams kyis
T02D3608:231a-49: mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod
T02D3608:231a-52: phyin chad mi byed pa'i sdom pa dang /
T02D3608:231a-53: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3608:231a-54: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3608:231a-55: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3608:231b-2: gsol ba 'debs pa rnams cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3608:231b-3: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrubs la spyi bor
T02D3608:231b-4: thal mo yang dag par sbyar nas tshigs su bcad
T02D3608:231b-5: pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin gshegs
T02D3608:231b-6: pa rnams la bskul ma gdab par bya'o //
T02D3608:231b-7: de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o //
T02D3608:231b-8: aom de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngags //
T02D3608:231b-9: sems can kun gyi dngos grub kun //
T02D3608:231b-10: phun sum tshogs pa kun 'byung bar //
T02D3608:231b-11: de bzhin gshegs rnams bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3608:231b-12: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes so //
T02D3608:231b-13: de'i rjes la mchod par bya ba dang /
T02D3608:231b-14: mchod pa dang mchod par byed pa po'i chos thams
T02D3608:231b-15: cad kyang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
T02D3608:231b-16: dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pas rmi lam
T02D3608:231b-17: gyi rkyen bzhin du bdag nyid so sor rig pas
T02D3608:231b-19: snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyi dra bas rang bzhin med par bya'o //
T02D3608:231b-20: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D3608:231b-21: de nas rang gi sems pam yig dmar po'i tshul
T02D3608:231b-22: gyis yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po'i steng
T02D3608:231b-23: du aam yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3608:231b-24: la h'um yig dkar po las nyi ma dang /
T02D3608:231b-25: zla ba la gnas pa'i hr'i:dkar pos byin gyis brlabs
T02D3608:231b-26: pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po bsgom par
T02D3608:231b-27: bya'o // spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro
T02D3608:231b-28: zhing de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo
T02D3608:231b-29: rje phag mo bcu drug gi rnam pa ston ka'i
T02D3608:231b-30: zla ba ltar dkar ba la spyan gsum dmar zhing
T02D3608:231b-31: bya'o // zlum pa / cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
T02D3608:231b-32: sna tshogs pa'i me tog gis rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D3608:231b-33: dbu skra grol ba phyed bcings bas rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D3608:231b-34: rdo rje nag po'i phreng ba gnyis kyi dbus su
T02D3608:231b-35: thod pa'i phreng ba dang zur phung gsum bcings pa
T02D3608:231b-36: ; 'khor lo dang rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3608:231b-37: 'gying bzhin pa'i ba dan gsum 'bar ba /
T02D3608:231b-38: phyag g-yas kyi 'dab ma na gnas pa /
T02D3608:231b-39: sngon du gsungs pa'i rdo rjes skyes bu'i mi shes pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par 'joms pa /
T02D3608:232a-1: pa dkar po steng gi rtse mo na rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa /
T02D3608:232a-2: 'og tu mi mgo skam po dang mgo bo rlon
T02D3608:232a-3: pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje gser gyi bum pa'i
T02D3608:232a-4: rtsa ba las byung ba sgra dang bcas pa'i dril
T02D3608:232a-5: bu g-yar ka phra mos brgyan pa ba dan sna
T02D3608:232a-6: tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa'i dbyug pa dpung pa
T02D3608:232a-7: la reg pa'i kha tv'am ga dang bdud bzhi'i khrag
T02D3608:232a-8: gis gang ba'i padma'i snod bsnams pa /
T02D3608:232a-9: khrag 'dzag bzhin pa'i mgo bo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba /
T02D3608:232a-10: padma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D3608:232a-11: shes pa med pa'i skyes bu zhabs g-yas brkyang gis
T02D3608:232a-12: bzhugs pa / gcer bu rab tu gtum pa nyi
T02D3608:232a-13: ma'i 'od lta bu rab tu 'phro ba'i ba spu'i
T02D3608:232a-14: bzhugs pa / phreng ba can / gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa /
T02D3608:232a-15: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dgu dang ldan pa /
T02D3608:232a-16: sprul pa sna tshogs pas phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa /
T02D3608:232a-17: gzhan nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i:yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D3608:232a-18: nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje snying po la bdag nyid rdo rje phag mor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3608:232a-19: de las snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi dra
T02D3608:232a-20: bas sems can thams cad de'i gzugs su gyur par
T02D3608:232a-21: bskyed nas bdag la rab tu zhugs te /
T02D3608:232a-22: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'o zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3608:232a-23: de'i rjes la rang gi lte bar sna tshogs padma
T02D3608:232a-24: la nyi ma dkar dmar la hr'i:yig dkar por bltas
T02D3608:232a-25: la / de la sngags ni phreng ba'i rnam pa
T02D3608:232a-26: dkar po 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa bzhin du sbyor
T02D3608:232a-27: bas zhal gyi sgo nas 'thon te /
T02D3608:232a-28: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi tshogs dang /
T02D3608:232a-36: sgyu rtsal la sogs pa'i mthu rnams bkug nas lte ba'i bu gnas rab tu zhugs te /
T02D3608:232a-37: rang dang gzhan gyi mi shes pa thams cad bsreg par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3608:232a-38: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3608:232a-39: yang dag par bskul nas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i
T02D3608:232a-40: ye shes pa'i lha mo mdun du bltas nas /
T02D3608:232a-41: sngon du gsungs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod
T02D3608:232a-42: yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod nas
T02D3608:232a-43: pheem yig gi sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3608:232a-44: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dpral bar bcings te /
T02D3608:232b-0: @232b g-yon du 'khor bzhin pas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-1: de dag gcig tu gyur pas bsgom zhing sngags kyis nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-3: aom yog buddha:sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D3608:232b-4: de la de'i sa bon gyis yang dag par bskul
T02D3608:232b-5: nas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la
T02D3608:232b-6: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gdan drangs te
T02D3608:232b-7: / de rnams kyis bdud rtsi lngar gyur pa'i de
T02D3608:232b-8: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bum pa rnams
T02D3608:232b-9: / dang / der sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i rol
T02D3608:232b-10: mo dang rnga dang dung dang rdza rnga dang 'khar
T02D3608:232b-11: rnga dang pi wang dang gling bu dang glu dbyangs
T02D3608:232b-12: / dang / rnams dang / lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyang ca co'i dpung gnyen rnams dang /
T02D3608:232b-13: gur gum dang ga bur dang gla rtsi dang dri bzangs me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /
T02D3608:232b-14: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3608:232b-15: de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol ba //
T02D3608:232b-16: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D3608:232b-17: de bzhin bdag kyang khrus bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-18: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pas bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D3608:232b-20: ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes pa 'dis
T02D3608:232b-21: byin gyis brlab cing sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma
T02D3608:232b-22: la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa dbu la bzhugs par
T02D3608:232b-23: bsam par bya'o // de nas de'i sprul pa rab
T02D3608:232b-24: tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D3608:232b-25: de la sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod
T02D3608:232b-26: pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas 'chad par 'gyur
T02D3608:232b-27: ba'i rim pas bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa
T02D3608:232b-28: byas nas ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bsam gtan
T02D3608:232b-29: byas nas spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa
T02D3608:232b-30: sngon du 'gro bas myur ba la sogs pa'i nyes
T02D3608:232b-31: pa dang bral bas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-33: hri'i:gang gi tshe ldang bar 'dod na de'i sngags kyi
T02D3608:232b-34: phreng ba lte ba la gnas pa'i hr'i:yig la bsgom
T02D3608:232b-35: par bya'o // mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du
T02D3608:232b-36: 'gro bas smon lam btab ste yongs su bsngo ba
T02D3608:232b-37: byas nas yi ge brgya ba lan gsum brjod de
T02D3608:232b-38: lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis bya ba bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-39: chos thams cad kyang de la gnyis su med par blta zhing spyod lam ci bde bar bya'o //
T02D3608:232b-40: de la yi ge brgya pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste /
T02D3608:232b-42: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D3608:232b-43: ma nu p'a la ya badzra satva tve no pa
T02D3608:232b-44: tishtha dri dho me bha wa su to shyo me
T02D3608:232b-45: bha ba su po shyo me bha ba aa nu
T02D3608:233a-1: pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho:/
T02D3608:233a-2: bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a
T02D3608:233a-3: me munytsa badzr'i bha wa ma h'a sa ma ya
T02D3608:233a-5: thun mtshams rnams su yang skad cig gis lha mo'i
T02D3608:233a-6: rnam pa mngon du byas te mchod pa la sogs
T02D3608:233a-7: pa sngon du 'gro bas ji srid 'dod kyi bar
T02D3608:233a-8: du bsgoms te sngon bzhin du sngags bzlas nas sngon
T02D3608:233a-9: ma bzhin du thams cad bya'o //
T02D3608:233a-10: mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams su yang thams cad byas
T02D3608:233a-11: nas nyal ba'i dus su spyi bor bla ma dang
T02D3608:233a-12: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs par
T02D3608:233a-13: bltas nas yang dag par mchod par bya'o ;
T02D3608:233a-14: / yan lag brgyad kyis phyag byas te nyal ba na seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal bar bya'o //
T02D3608:233a-15: de nas snga dro'i thun la lha mos gnyid rab
T02D3608:233a-16: tu bslang nas sngon bzhin du thams cad bya'o zhes
T02D3608:233a-17: so // yang na gang zhig rim pa 'dis sa
T02D3608:233a-18: phyogs 'ga' zhig tu ro'i gdan la skyil krung gis
T02D3608:233a-19: stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3608:233a-20: sems can thams cad la snying rjes dmigs nas /
T02D3608:233a-21: sdig pa bshags pa nas brtsams te ji srid byang
T02D3608:233a-22: chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du sngon du 'gro
T02D3608:233a-23: bas a'a:yig yongs su gyur pa las rang gi lce
T02D3608:233a-24: padma'i rnam pa la hr'i:yig 'bar zhing 'od gsal ba
T02D3608:233a-25: ji srid 'dod par bsgoms shing brtan par byas nas
T02D3608:233a-26: brgya phyed kyi phreng ba'i rdog po srad bu la
T02D3608:233a-27: brgyus nas thun gsum mam thun bzhir rnal 'byor pas
T02D3608:233a-28: bzlas par bya'o // gnyid log pa na sngon gyi cho ga bzhin du nyal bar bya'o //
T02D3608:233a-29: de bzhin du bzlas pa dang bsgom pa cho ga
T02D3608:233a-30: bzhin du rjes su gnang bas 'jig rten pa'i chos
T02D3608:233a-31: brgyad las nges par grol nas dad pa dang dam
T02D3608:233a-32: tshig dang sdom pa la gnas shing brtse ba dang
T02D3608:233a-33: ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par byas
T02D3608:233a-34: nas / de'i phyi nas rnal 'byor pas 'bum phrag
T02D3608:233a-35: bdun bzlas pas bstan bcos dang sgyu rtsal gyi chos
T02D3608:233a-36: thams cad la rang gis mngon par shes par 'gyur
T02D3608:233a-37: nas / ro // shes rab dang ldan pa dang dpa' ba dang /
T02D3608:233a-39: 'khor gyis zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro //
T02D3608:233a-42: dug dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs ba rnams kyis bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3608:233b-0: gang zos pa de thams @233b cad kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
T02D3608:233b-1: 'di'i sngags bzlas pas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3608:233b-2: 'di'i sngags kyis thod le kor la mngon par bsngags
T02D3608:233b-3: nas gang gi lag tu byin na blun po yang
T02D3608:233b-5: de'i dri tsam gyis kyang sbrul la sogs pa rnams nye nus pa ma yin no //
T02D3608:233b-6: 'di rnams kyi bar du gcod pas bar chad byed
T02D3608:233b-7: pa rnams dang gzhan rnams kyi yang thams cad la
T02D3608:233b-8: phan par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D3608:233b-9: bdag gis mang po smos pas ci zhig bya ste /
T02D3608:233b-10: bems po'i blo yang bstan bcos la nyon mongs par bya mi dgos te /
T02D3608:233b-11: mi g-yo ba'i sems kyis so //
T02D3608:233b-12: sngags 'di 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na 'dis shes rab kyi snang ba sgrub par byed do //
T02D3608:233b-13: 'dir yang gang zhig rnams kyis sems brtan par gyur
T02D3608:233b-14: pas yon tan mtha' yas pa gsungs pa dang ldan
T02D3608:233b-15: par 'gyur ro // de rnams kyis shin tu mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes so //
